title: Stakefast
author: Stakefast
content: A quite interesting thread in my opinion, I am on a lot of gambling site discords and a lot of them have channels like "big wins" My last big hit was on wolfbet, I hit 133,337x on limbo which made me win arround 300$ - Arround a week ago, this is the hit:https://wolf.bet/de/user/transactions?betType=session&id=f4536e5e-21b0-4b2a-a27b-12f8967f140f&modal=session&table=sessionsWhat was your last big hit? I would like to know

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Well my last huge win was only 50$ when I all in my remaining balance left to my 100$ original bankroll and win on Blackjack. Your win is so huge which is very hard to hit. I doubt many user here are using same strategy as yours that hunts huge multiplier using consistent bet of small amount until you hit your target multiplier. Most of the time players here are winning insane multiplier on slots but not that same level. Can you share how much you spend before you finally hit that multiplier. This is my first time someone hit 100k multiplier on limbo.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: My above profit is my last huge win when I’m still playing live show games Crazy time. I manage to win around 19K XRP that time which is worth approximately 3800$ using 0.2$ per XRP. I bet on crazy time I hit x300+ multiplier. After that I stop playing that live show games since I’m just losing most of the time that nearly empty my previous profit. Luckily I manage to secure profit beforeI gamble again.I post this screenshot first on Sportsbet thread before.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1458034.msg54556238#msg54556238

comments.author: efialtis
comments.body: @Stakefast Quite the multi you hit there, congrats! We have seen some crazy GOSU wins on Wolf Limbo, too!Images speak louder than words...  https://www.btcgosu.com/win-images/this-is-mental/

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on October 23, 2022, 10:57:44 AM<snip>That kind of multiplier (133,337x) is huge and rare. How many bets have you placed before you hit that big one? You have a very good luck if yoh happen to only bet one before that or a few. If I remember it correctly, my biggest multiplier was only around 1000+ to 2000x. So i find that 100k+ x very lucky.Ofcourse that's a big hit

comments.author: smartaction
comments.body: MY last big win was $800 in last month. and i won it from dice . i was roll for $400 and set profit 2% and win/loss 50/50 . I lost all my money here and re-deposited the remaining $400 there and I angrily bet all my remaining dollars there.  But then my luck was good so I won and make my money 2x in 1 min

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: I am always wondering how everyone is getting to that big level? I have seen people hitting bigger and bigger multipliers in the Games and Round section.  Whether it is roobet, Duelbit or some other casino, people will just throw themselves into various slots and play multipliers likes 777, or even 1000 plus many times. I have rarely hit anything above 100x multiplier and I find myself badly unlucky when it comes to playing slots. All I have hit is around 30-50x max and nothing above that. I always play very cautiously and do not put anything above 10 cents per bet including combination of lines and coins too. Congrats on your win. I hope you had maximum profit in that since before that there would have been huge slides for you. :-D

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Flexystar on October 23, 2022, 12:50:00 PMI am always wondering how everyone is getting to that big level? I have seen people hitting bigger and bigger multipliers in the Games and Round section.  Whether it is roobet, Duelbit or some other casino, people will just throw themselves into various slots and play multipliers likes 777, or even 1000 plus many times. I have rarely hit anything above 100x multiplier and I find myself badly unlucky when it comes to playing slots. All I have hit is around 30-50x max and nothing above that. I always play very cautiously and do not put anything above 10 cents per bet including combination of lines and coins too. Congrats on your win. I hope you had maximum profit in that since before that there would have been huge slides for you. :-DHave the same situation. I'm kind of unlucky for the most part of my multiplier adventure. It never worked for me. The more l lost money when I get to cross my fingers in rolling dice. The sad part is that I meant the money for investing in riding a coin that is pumping.I get lucky with sports though. Sometimes the odds are giving the signal to bet which made me accumulate the wins.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: My last winning was only $62 from sportsbet. I placed a bet on cricket and won 62$ for just $15.  But even though $62 is a low reward, I'm happy with it.  Because I won that bet.  So that's a big bonus for me, because I bet it just adds to my fun.  But when I win those bets, that winning really gives me a lot of joy.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Since you are talking about low values mostly in this thread,my last win was quite some weeks ago in Slot Machines at Diamonds of the Realm at 227 USD but where I live this is no big amount whatsoever so I don't consider it a big win.It has been almost two years since I have not hit a huge win and I am fighting hard for it every week but apparently gambling Gods have completely forgotten me at this point and I only keep losing nowadays.Congrats on your huge multiplier,shame it is such a low value though.

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on October 23, 2022, 10:57:44 AMWhat was your last big hit? I would like to know  Not much compared to the amount of other players out here but it was worth around 40-50USD but it was quite the amount for me especially as I only gamble around 50-70USD per week. I won by playing on a dice game and I was trying out a strategy that I found online which only works one time and I lose almost the same amount the next day doing the same thing.Anyways, Nice win with that kind of multiplier, I would love to know about the bet you did on that one.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I was tempted by @efialtis showing off his winnings at BC.game and finally, I registered myself there and deposited some money to play. Damn This might not be a big win as it was only $8.84 in the Mental - NoLimit game. I've never even achieved such a victory beforeHis great luck impressed me that he could get a lot of money. Maybe next time I will try it and let's see if I can win big like him. Salute to you @efialtis.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Sorry to say, but I've never won anything significant while gambling. I'm not a good gambler, but I do love to play. I've won some money in the past, but it was never more than $100. I would love to win something big, but it just doesn't happen to me.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on October 23, 2022, 10:57:44 AMA quite interesting thread in my opinion, I am on a lot of gambling site discords and a lot of them have channels like "big wins" That's for sure, of course, winning and losing has become a culture in gambling, of course everyone who has ever bet has experienced big wins, but I've forgotten my biggest win, which is clear I've experienced it on online crypto gambling sites on this forum.Hopefully in the future you can win again, expectations can be higher than now, the point is: don't be greedy in the gambling arena, it can destroy you, keep control of winning or lost, Don't let the devil control you in betting.

comments.author: mak013
comments.body: I won one time about $1000 and two times about $500. This is all my "big" wins. And i lost all these money later. All these times i deposited about $50, so it was a good win for such deposit i think. I can`t say that i`m serious gambler - i mostly gamble for fun, but i`m gambling for about 5 years, 1-4 times per month and i`ve got just three wins that i can call "big".

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: to be honest i never win a lot but i like a lot of games in gambling just for fun, i like dice games and i once got a win of only $70 and even then it ran out again because of dice games because i forgot to limit losses using automatic spins so my funds were drained a lot after I went to the toilet, but it didn't make me regret it just paid more attention when playing dice again

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: I shared my last big win here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5249415.msg61130023#msg61130023It was a win on Fruit Party, I hit the max win with a $0.3 base bet so I won around $1,500 Best thing in my last big win is that I did not spend too much and I hit it with no more than 150 spins. Maybe $1,500 is not a big amount for others but it is absolutely decent amount for me who live in 3rd world countries.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.created_time: October 23, 2022, 03:29:39 PMLast edit: October 23, 2022, 03:48:59 PM by lionheart78
comments.body: Quote from: Flexystar on October 23, 2022, 12:50:00 PMI am always wondering how everyone is getting to that big level? I have seen people hitting bigger and bigger multipliers in the Games and Round section.  Whether it is roobet, Duelbit or some other casino, people will just throw themselves into various slots and play multipliers likes 777, or even 1000 plus many times. I have rarely hit anything above 100x multiplier and I find myself badly unlucky when it comes to playing slots. All I have hit is around 30-50x max and nothing above that. I always play very cautiously and do not put anything above 10 cents per bet including combination of lines and coins too. Gambling result is random, you may need patience to have your turn to get higher wins.  As long as you keep betting regularly, there is a chance that you can hit big time in the future. Since you are playing slots, you might try different slot providers, who know your lucky slot is just hiding somewhere.  Just don't chase losses and always make sure that you are betting what you can afford to lose.My last big win  was just 4 days ago.  I happen to hit a good bonus round on Moon Princess 100.  Detail is on this post.  I turned the €25 free bets into 16mBTC.  Quote from: panjul07 on October 23, 2022, 03:03:55 PMI shared my last big win here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5249415.msg61130023#msg61130023It was a win on Fruit Party, I hit the max win with a $0.3 base bet so I won around $1,500 Best thing in my last big win is that I did not spend too much and I hit it with no more than 150 spins. Maybe $1,500 is not a big amount for others but it is absolutely decent amount for me who live in 3rd world countries. This win is equivalent to a three to six month's salary in my country.  It is more than a decent amount in a developing country.  To some who are good entrepreneurs, this amount can be a life-changing win since they can have the capital for their business venture.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: Quote from: Stakefast on October 23, 2022, 10:57:44 AMWhat was your last big hit? I would like to know  My last big win was from betting on our local basketball league named PBA. I bet on the last game of the finals 100$ and I managed to win $170. I didn't really bet on a gambling website but it's just peer-to-peer type of gambling since that finals matchup were very popular here in our country. I usually go big when it comes to sports betting since there is a better chance of winning compared to other types of gambling like crash game, roullete, or dice.

comments.author: gantez
comments.body: Seeing some people sharing the winning they have and with some good money really interesting to me. I have no big win yet but the win I have is not more than a $100 few times and lost some too. I have to put effort to it and I hope to be lucky in the future to hit it big some day.
